abstractText: Since 1991, a total of 227spawning sites have been described for fall Chinook salmonin Hells Canyon on the Snake River. Each year, a subset of these is selected to be surveyed by unmanned aerial systems (UAS) in order to count redds. These redd counts are used to determine the total number of redds constructed in the canyon in a given year.
title: Snake River Fall Chinook Salmon Spawning Site Selection for Surveys v1.0
